pr_title: Add workaround for input event problems in MongoInputStatusService

timeline.message:
Add workaround for input event problems in MongoInputStatusService

This is a workaround for the problem described in #7812.

When we receive an "InputDeleted" event, check if the input still exists
in the database. If so, the input has only been stopped and we don't
want to delete our state.

Refs #7812

timeline.bodyText: This should be split into two separate tests to make it easier to see if a change breaks one but not the other.
timeline.author: waab76

timeline.message: Split event handler test into two tests
